data.name: Fantasy Grounds - Green Dragons (Token Pack)
data.detailed_description:
Green Dragons


A Graemation Token pack of hand drawn digital character tokens, made for adventures set around Green Dragons, their humanoid species.

Add some flavour to your Encounters, NPCs or to be used as Characters with these 18 Green Dragon tokens. These Tokens include a Green Dragon, a variety armoured Dragon humanoids covering all the core fantasy armours, and even some dragon eggs.

Included in this Token Pack:

  • Green-Bandedmail-Dragonborn
  • Green-Barbarian-Dragonborn
  • Green--Bard-Dragonborn
  • Green-Breast-Plate-Dragonborn
  • Green-Chainmail-Dragonborn
  • Green--Chain-Shirt-Dragonborn
  • Green-Druid-Dragonborn
  • Green-Eggs
  • Green-Egg-Shell
  • Green-Hide-Dragonborn
  • Green-Leather-Dragonborn
  • Green-Monk-Dragonborn
  • Green-Platemail-Dragonborn
  • Green-Scalemail-Dragonborn
  • Green-Splintmail-Dragonborn
  • Green-Studded-Leather-Dragonborn
  • Green-Wizard-Dragonborn
  • Dragon-Green

Released on April 04, 2017. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.2.2 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate License and any Ruleset.

data.short_description: Green DragonsA Graemation Token pack of hand drawn digital character tokens, made for adventures set around Green Dragons, their humanoid species.Add some flavour to your Encounters, NPCs or to be used as Characters with these 18 Green Dragon tokens.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
